   32: %% 1224           0 :                 outc(ubuf[i]);
   33: %% 1225             :             }

   35: %% 1227           0 :             outc(lastput);

   38: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   39:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   40:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   41: 	 get_columns_and_rows/1, exit_initial/1, job_control_local/1,
   42: 	 job_control_remote/1,stop_during_init/1,wrap/1,
   43:          shell_history/1, shell_history_resize/1, shell_history_eaccess/1,
   44:          shell_history_repair/1, shell_history_repair_corrupt/1,
   45:          shell_history_corrupt/1,
   46:          shell_history_custom/1, shell_history_custom_errors/1,
   47: 	 job_control_remote_noshell/1,ctrl_keys/1,
   48:          get_columns_and_rows_escript/1,
   49:          shell_get_password/1,
   50:          shell_navigation/1, shell_multiline_navigation/1, shell_multiline_prompt/1,
   51:          shell_xnfix/1, shell_delete/1,

   68: -export([test_invalid_keymap/1, test_valid_keymap/1]).
   69: %% Exports for custom shell history module
   70: -export([load/0, add/1]).
   71: %% For custom prompt testing
   72: -export([prompt/1]).
   73: -record(tmux, {peer, node, name, orig_location }).
   74: suite() ->
   75:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   76:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   77: 
   78: all() ->
   79:     [{group, to_erl},
   80:      {group, tty}].
   81: 
   82: groups() ->
   83:     [{to_erl,[],
   84:       [get_columns_and_rows_escript,get_columns_and_rows,
   85:        exit_initial, job_control_local,
   86:        job_control_remote, job_control_remote_noshell,
   87:        ctrl_keys, stop_during_init, wrap,
   88:        shell_invalid_ansi,
   89:        shell_get_password,
   90:        {group, shell_history},
   91:        {group, remsh}]},
   92:      {shell_history, [],
   93:       [shell_history,
   94:        shell_history_resize,
   95:        shell_history_eaccess,
   96:        shell_history_repair,
   97:        shell_history_repair_corrupt,
   98:        shell_history_corrupt,
   99:        {group, sh_custom}
  100:       ]},
  101:      {sh_custom, [],
  102:       [shell_history_custom,
  103:        shell_history_custom_errors]},
  104:      {remsh, [],
  105:       [remsh_basic,
  106:        remsh_error,
  107:        remsh_longnames,
  108:        remsh_no_epmd,
  109:        remsh_expand_compatibility_25,
  110:        remsh_expand_compatibility_later_version]},
  111:      {tty,[],
  112:       [{group,tty_unicode},
  113:        {group,tty_latin1},
  114:        test_invalid_keymap, test_valid_keymap,
  115:        shell_suspend,
  116:        shell_full_queue,
  117:        external_editor,
  118:        external_editor_visual,
  119:        shell_ignore_pager_commands
  120:       ]},
  121:      {tty_unicode,[parallel],
  122:       [{group,tty_tests},
  123:        shell_invalid_unicode,
  124:        external_editor_unicode
  125:        %% unicode wrapping does not work right yet
  126:        %% shell_unicode_wrap,
  127:        %% shell_delete_unicode_wrap,
  128:        %% shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap,
  129:        %% shell_update_window_unicode_wrap
  130:       ]},
  131:      {tty_latin1,[],[{group,tty_tests}]},
  132:      {tty_tests, [parallel],
  133:       [shell_navigation, shell_multiline_navigation, shell_multiline_prompt,
  134:        shell_xnfix, shell_delete,
  135:        shell_transpose, shell_search, shell_insert,
  136:        shell_update_window, shell_small_window_multiline_navigation, shell_huge_input,

  144: 
  145: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  146:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
  147:     os:putenv("TERM", "vt100"),
  148:     [{term,Term}|Config].
  149: 
  150: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  151:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  152:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: init_per_group(to_erl, Config) ->
  156:     case rtnode:get_progs() of
  157:         {error, Error} ->
  158:             {skip, Error};
  159:         _ ->
  160:             DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
  161:             [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config]
  162:     end;
  163: init_per_group(remsh, Config) ->
  164:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  165:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  166:         new -> Config
  167:     end;
  168: init_per_group(shell_history, Config) ->
  169:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  170:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  171:         new -> Config
  172:     end;
  173: init_per_group(tty, Config) ->
  174:     case string:split(tmux("-V")," ") of
  175:         ["tmux",[Num,$.|_]] when Num >= $3, Num =< $9 ->
  176:             tmux("kill-session"),
  177:             "" = tmux("-u new-session -x 50 -y 60 -d"),
  178:             ["" = tmux(["set-environment '",Name,"' '",Value,"'"])
  179:              || {Name,Value} <- os:env()],
  180:             Config;
  181:         ["tmux", Vsn] ->
  182:             {skip, "invalid tmux version " ++ Vsn ++ ". Need vsn 3 or later"};
  183:         Error ->
  184:             {skip, "tmux not installed " ++ Error}
  185:     end;
  186: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty_unicode;
  187:                                    Group =:= tty_latin1 ->
  188:     [Lang,_] =
  189:         string:split(
  190:           os:getenv("LC_ALL",
  191:                     os:getenv("LC_CTYPE",
  192:                               os:getenv("LANG","en_US.UTF-8"))),"."),
  193:     case Group of
  194:         tty_unicode ->
  195:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  196:         tty_latin1 ->
  197:             % [{encoding, latin1},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".ISO-8859-1"}]}|Config],
  198:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"}
  199:     end;
  200: init_per_group(sh_custom, Config) ->
  201:     %% Ensure that ERL_AFLAGS will not override the value of the shell_history variable.
  202:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-noshell","-kernel","shell_history","not_overridden"]),
  203:     try erpc:call(Node, application, get_env, [kernel, shell_history], rtnode:timeout(normal)) of
  204:         {ok, not_overridden} ->
  205:             Config;
  206:         _ ->
  207:             SkipText = "shell_history variable is overridden (probably by ERL_AFLAGS)",
  208:             {skip, SkipText}
  209:     catch
  210:         C:R:Stk ->
  211:             io:format("~p\n~p\n~p\n", [C,R,Stk]),
  212:             {skip, "Unexpected error"}
  213:     after
  214:         peer:stop(Peer)
  215:     end;
  216: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  217:     Config.
  218: 
  219: end_per_group(tty, _Config) ->
  220:     Windows = string:split(tmux("list-windows"), "\n", all),
  221:     lists:foreach(
  222:       fun(W) ->
  223:               case string:split(W, " ", all) of
  224:                   ["0:" | _] -> ok;
  225:                   [No, _Name | _] ->
  226:                       "" = os:cmd(["tmux select-window -t ", string:split(No,":")]),
  227:                       ct:log("~ts~n~ts",[W, os:cmd(lists:concat(["tmux capture-pane -p -e"]))])
  228:               end
  229:       end, Windows),
  230: %    "" = os:cmd("tmux kill-session")
  231:     ok;
  232: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  233:     Config.
  234: 
  235: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
  236:     Path = [Func,
  237:             [proplists:get_value(name,P) ||
  238:                 P <- [proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[])] ++
  239:                     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])]],
  240:     [{tc_path, lists:concat(lists:join("-",lists:flatten(Path)))} | Config].
  241: 
  242: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  243:     GroupProperties = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  244:     case (GroupProperties =/= false) andalso proplists:get_value(parallel, GroupProperties, false) of
  245:         true -> ok;
  246:         false ->
  247:             %% Terminate any connected nodes. They may disturb test cases that follow.
  248:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  249:                                   catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, [])
  250:                           end, nodes()),
  251:             ok
  252:     end.
  253: 
  254: %%-define(DEBUG,1).
  255: -ifdef(DEBUG).
  256: -define(dbg(Data),ct:pal("~p",[Data])).
  257: -else.
  258: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
  259: -endif.
  260: 
  261: string_to_term(Str) ->
  262:     {ok,Tokens,_EndLine} = erl_scan:string(Str ++ "."),
  263:     {ok,AbsForm} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  264:     {value,Value,_Bs} = erl_eval:exprs(AbsForm, erl_eval:new_bindings()),
  265:     Value.
  266: 
  267: run_unbuffer_escript(Rows, Columns, EScript, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut) ->
  268:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  269:     TmpFile = filename:join(DataDir, "tmp"),
  270:     ok = file:write_file(TmpFile, <<>>),
  271:     CommandModifier =
  272:         case {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} of
  273:             {false, false} -> "";
  274:             {true, false} -> io_lib:format(" < ~s", [TmpFile]);
  275:             {false, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile]);
  276:             {true, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s < ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile, TmpFile])
  277:         end,
  278:     Command = io_lib:format("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty rows ~p; stty columns ~p; escript ~s ~s\"",
  279:                             [Rows, Columns, EScript, CommandModifier]),
  280:     %% io:format("Command: ~s ~n", [Command]),
  281:     Out = os:cmd(Command),
  282:     %% io:format("Out: ~p ~n", [Out]),
  283:     string_to_term(Out).
  284: 
  285: get_columns_and_rows_escript(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  286:     ExpectUnbufferInstalled =
  287:         try
  288:             "79" = string:trim(os:cmd("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty columns 79 ; tput cols\"")),
  289:             true
  290:         catch
  291:             _:_ -> false
  292:         end,
  293:     case ExpectUnbufferInstalled of
  294:         false ->
  295:             {skip,
  296:              "The unbuffer tool (https://core.tcl-lang.org/expect/index) does not seem to be installed.~n"
  297:              "On Ubuntu/Debian: \"sudo apt-get install expect\""};
  298:         true ->
  299:             DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  300:             IoColumnsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_columns.erl"),
  301:             IoRowsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_rows.erl"),
  302:             [
  303:              begin
  304:                  {ok, 42} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut),
  305:                  {ok, 99} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut)
  306:              end
  307:              ||
  308:                 {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} <- [{false, false}, {true, false}, {false, true}]
  309:             ],
  310:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, true, true),
  311:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, true, true),
  312:             ok
  313:     end.
  314: 
  315: %% Test that the shell can access columns and rows.
  316: get_columns_and_rows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  317:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  318: 	old ->
  319:             test_columns_and_rows(old, []);
  320: 	new ->
  321:             test_columns_and_rows(old, ["-oldshell"]),
  322:             test_columns_and_rows(new, [])
  323:     end,
  324:     ok.
  325: 
  326: test_columns_and_rows(old, Args) ->
  327:     rtnode:run(
  328:       [{putline, ""},
  329:        {putline, "2."},
  330:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  331:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  332:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"},
  333:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  334:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"}
  335:       ], [], [], Args),
  336: 
  337:     rtnode:run(
  338:       [{putline, ""},
  339:        {putline, "2."},
  340:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  341:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  342:        {expect, "{ok,90}\r\n"},
  343:        {putline,"io:rows()."},
  344:        {expect, "{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  345:       [],
  346:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ",
  347:       Args);
  348: test_columns_and_rows(new, _Args) ->
  349:     rtnode:run(
  350:       [{putline, ""},
  351:        {expect, "1> $"},
  352:        {putline, "2."},
  353:        {expect, "\r\n2\r\n"},
  354:        {expect, "> $"},
  355:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  356:        {expect, "{ok,80}\r\n"},
  357:        {expect, "> $"},
  358:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  359:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,24}\r\n"}
  360:       ]),
  361: 
  362:     rtnode:run(
  363:       [{putline, ""},
  364:        {expect, "1> $"},
  365:        {putline, "2."},
  366:        {expect,  "\r\n2\r\n"},
  367:        {expect, "> $"},
  368:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  369:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,90}\r\n"},
  370:        {expect, "> $"},
  371:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  372:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  373:       [],
  374:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ").
  375: 
  376: shell_navigation(Config) ->
  377: 
  378:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  379: 
  380:     try
  381:         [begin
  382:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}"),
  383:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward
  384:              check_content(Term, "{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}$"),
  385:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  386:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  387:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  388:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  389:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  390:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  391:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  392:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  393:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  394:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',")}),
  395:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  396:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  397:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  398:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b'")}),
  399:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  400:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  401:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  402:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
  403:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  404:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  405:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  406:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  407:              send_tty(Term,"C-H"),
  408:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  409:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  410:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  411:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  412:          end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  413:         ok
  414:     after
  415:         stop_tty(Term)
  416:     end.
  417: shell_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  418:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  419: 
  420:     try
  421:         [begin
  422:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  423:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,"),
  424:              check_location(Term, {0,width("{aaa,")}),
  425:              send_tty(Term,"\n'b"++U++"b',"),
  426:              check_location(Term, {0, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  427:              send_tty(Term,"\nccc}"),
  428:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward (blink)
  429:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  430:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  431:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  432:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  433:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  434:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  435:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  436:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc")}),
  437:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  438:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  439:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  440:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  441:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  442:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  443:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  444:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  445:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  446:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 1}),
  447:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  448:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b'")}),
  449:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  450:              check_location(Term, {-2, width("{aaa,")}),
  451:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  452:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  453:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  454:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  455:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  456:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U)}),
  457:              send_tty(Term,"M-<"),
  458:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  459:              send_tty(Term,"M->"),
  460:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  461:              check_location(Term, {0,width("ccc")}),
  462:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  463:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  464:              check_location(Term, {0,0}),
  465:              send_tty(Term,"C-h"), % Backspace
  466:              check_location(Term, {-1,width("ccc}")}),
  467:              send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  468:              send_tty(Term, "End"),
  469:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  470:              send_tty(Term,"M-Enter"),
  471:              check_content(Term, ".. ,"),
  472:              check_location(Term, {-1,0}),
  473:              send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  474:              check_location(Term, {-3,0}),
  475:              send_tty(Term,"{'"++U++"',\n\n\nworks}.\n")
  476:             end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  477:         ok
  478:     after
  479:         stop_tty(Term)
  480:     end.
  481: 
  482: shell_multiline_prompt(Config) ->
  483:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","{edlin,inverted_space_prompt}"]}|Config]),
  484:     Term2 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","\"...> \""]}|Config]),
  485:     Term3 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","edlin"]}|Config]),
  486: 
  487:     try
  488:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  489:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  490:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  491:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  492:         ok
  493:     after
  494:         stop_tty(Term1)
  495:     end,
  496:     try
  497:         check_location(Term2, {0, 0}),
  498:         send_tty(Term2,"\na"),
  499:         check_location(Term2, {0, 1}),
  500:         check_content(Term2, "...> a"),
  501:         ok
  502:     after
  503:         stop_tty(Term2)
  504:     end,
  505:     try
  506:         send_tty(Term3,"\na"),
  507:         check_location(Term3, {0, 1}),
  508:         check_content(Term3, ".. a"),
  509:         ok
  510:     after
  511:         stop_tty(Term3)
  512:     end.
  513: 
  514: shell_clear(Config) ->
  515: 
  516:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  517:     {Rows, _Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  518: 
  519:     try
  520:         send_tty(Term,"foobar."),
  521:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  522:         check_content(Term, "foobar"),
  523:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  524:         send_tty(Term,"bazbat"),
  525:         check_location(Term, {0, 6}),
  526:         send_tty(Term,"C-L"),
  527:         check_location(Term, {-Rows+1, 6}),
  528:         check_content(Term, "bazbat")
  529:     after
  530:         stop_tty(Term)
  531:     end.
  532: 
  533: shell_xnfix(Config) ->
  534: 
  535:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  536: 
  537:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  538:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  539: 
  540:     As = lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1,"a"),
  541: 
  542:     try
  543:         [begin
  544:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  545:              send_tty(Term,As),
  546:              check_content(Term,[As,$$]),
  547:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - 1}),
  548:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  549:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  550:              send_tty(Term,"aaa"),
  551:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 3}),
  552:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,3 + width(U))],
  553:              send_tty(Term,U),
  554:              %% a{Cols-1}U\naaaaa
  555:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  556:                                  U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  557:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  558:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  559:              send_tty(Term,U),
  560:              %% a{Cols-1}U\nUaaaaa
  561:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  562:                                  U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  563:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  564:              %% send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  565:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  566:              %% a{Cols-2}U\nUaaaaa
  567:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  568:              %%                     U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  569:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  570:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  571:              %%                     U,U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  572:              %% send_tty(Term,"aa"),
  573:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  574:              %%                     U,"a\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  575:              %% check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  576:              send_tty(Term,"C-K"),
  577:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  578:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  579:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  580:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  581:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  582:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  583:              ok
  584:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  585:     after
  586:         stop_tty(Term)
  587:     end.
  588: 
  589: 
  590: %% Characters that are larger than 2 wide need special handling when they
  591: %% are at the end of the current line.
  592: shell_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  593: 
  594:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  595: 
  596:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  597:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  598: 
  599:     try
  600:         [begin
  601:              FirstLine = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U)*2 + 1,"a")],
  602:              OtherLineA = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"a")],
  603:              OtherLineB = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"b")],
  604:              OtherLineC = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"c")],
  605:              OtherLineD = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"d")],
  606:              send_tty(Term,FirstLine),
  607:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  608:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  609: 
  610:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineA),
  611:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  612:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  613: 
  614:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineB),
  615:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  616:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  617: 
  618:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineC),
  619:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  620:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  621: 
  622:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineD),
  623:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  624:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  625: 
  626:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  627:              check_location(Term, {-4, 0}), %% Broken
  628:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  629:              check_location(Term, {-4, width(U)}), %% Broken
  630: 
  631:              send_tty(Term,"DC"), %% Broken
  632:              check_content(Term, ["a.*",U,"$"]),
  633:              check_content(Term, ["^b.*",U,"c$"]),
  634:              check_content(Term, ["^c.*",U,"dd$"]),
  635: 
  636:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  637:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  638:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  639:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  640:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  641:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  642: 
  643:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  644:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  645:     after
  646:         stop_tty(Term)
  647:     end.
  648: 
  649: shell_delete(Config) ->
  650: 
  651:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  652: 
  653:     try
  654: 
  655:         [ begin
  656:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  657:               check_content(Term, "> a$"),
  658:               check_location(Term, {0, 1}),
  659:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  660:               check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  661:               check_content(Term, ">$"),
  662:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  663:               send_tty(Term,U),
  664:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a, U])}),
  665:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  666:               send_tty(Term,U),
  667:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U,$a,U])}),
  668:               check_content(Term, ["> a",U,$a,U,"$"]),
  669:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  670:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  671:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  672:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  673:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  674:               send_tty(Term,U),
  675:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U])}),
  676:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  677:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  678:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  679:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  680:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  681:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  682:               check_content(Term, ["> a$"]),
  683:               send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  684:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  685:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  686:               check_location(Term, {0, width([])})
  687:           end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  688:     after
  689:         stop_tty(Term)
  690:     end.
  691: 
  692: %% When deleting characters at the edge of the screen that are "large",
  693: %% we need to take special care.
  694: shell_delete_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  695: 
  696:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  697: 
  698:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  699:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  700: 
  701:     try
  702:         [begin
  703:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  704:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  705:              send_tty(Term,[U,U,"aaaaa"]),
  706:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,U,"aaaaa$"]),
  707:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,5+2)],
  708:              check_location(Term,{0,-Col}),
  709:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  710:              check_content(Term,"> a* \n"),
  711:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 1}),
  712:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  713:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  714:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 2}),
  715:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  716:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U," \n"]),
  717:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 3}),
  718:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  719:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"\n"]),
  720:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  721:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 4}),
  722:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  723:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"a\n"]),
  724:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  725:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 5}),
  726:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  727:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  728:     after
  729:         stop_tty(Term)
  730:     end.
  731: 
  732: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  733: %% to take extra care
  734: shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap(Config) ->
  735: 
  736:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  737: 
  738:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  739:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  740: 
  741:     try
  742:         [begin
  743:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  744:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  745:              send_tty(Term,["a",U,"aaaaa"]),
  746:              check_content(Term,["\na",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  747:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  748:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  749:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  750:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  751:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  752:              check_content(Term,["> a* \n"]),
  753:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  754:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  755:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  756:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  757:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  758:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"a\n"]),
  759:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  760:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  761:     after
  762:         stop_tty(Term)
  763:     end.
  764: 
  765: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  766: %% to take extra care
  767: shell_update_window_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  768: 
  769:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  770: 
  771:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  772:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  773: 
  774:     try
  775:         [begin
  776:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U) + 1,"a")),
  777:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  778:              send_tty(Term,[U,"aaaaa"]),
  779:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  780:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols+1]),
  781:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\naaaaa$"]),
  782:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols]),
  783:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  784:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  785:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  786:     after
  787:         stop_tty(Term)
  788:     end.
  789: 
  790: shell_transpose(Config) ->
  791: 
  792:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  793: 
  794:     Unicode = [[$a]] ++ hard_unicode(),
  795: 
  796:     try
  797:         [
  798:          begin
  799:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  800:              [send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U],
  801:              send_tty(Term,"b"),
  802:              [[send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U2] || U2 <- Unicode],
  803:              send_tty(Term,"cde"),
  804:              check_content(Term, ["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  805:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde"])}),
  806:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  807:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  808:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  809:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  810:              check_location(Term, {0, 1+width([U])}),
  811:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  812:              check_content(Term, ["ab",U,Unicode,"cde$"]),
  813:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  814:              check_content(Term, ["ab",hd(Unicode),U,tl(Unicode),"cde$"]),
  815:              [send_tty(Term,"C-T") || _ <- lists:seq(1,length(Unicode)-1)],
  816:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,U,"cde$"]),
  817:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  818:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de$"]),
  819:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U])}),
  820:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  821:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de"])}),
  822:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  823:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  824:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  825:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  826:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  827:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  828:          end || U <- Unicode],
  829:         ok
  830:     after
  831:         stop_tty(Term),
  832:         ok
  833:     end.
  834: 
  835: shell_search(C) ->
  836:     Term = start_tty(C),
  837: 
  838:     try
  839:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  840:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  841:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  842:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  843:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  844:         send_tty(Term,[16#1f600]),
  845:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  846:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  847:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  848:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  849:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  850:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  851:         send_tty(Term,"C-a"),
  852:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(C, "'a'.")}),
  853:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  854:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  855:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  856:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  857:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  858:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  859:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*a."),
  860:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  861:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  862:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  863:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  864:         send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  865:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  866:         ok
  867:     after
  868:         stop_tty(Term),
  869:         ok
  870:     end.
  871: 
  872: shell_insert(Config) ->
  873:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  874: 
  875:     try
  876:         send_tty(Term,"abcdefghijklm"),
  877:         check_content(Term, "abcdefghijklm$"),
  878:         check_location(Term, {0, 13}),
  879:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  880:         send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  881:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  882:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  883:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  884:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  885:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijklm$"),
  886:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
  887:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  888:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  889:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  890:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijlm$"),
  891:         ok
  892:     after
  893:         stop_tty(Term)
  894:     end.
  895: 
  896: shell_update_window(Config) ->
  897:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  898: 
  899:     Text = lists:flatten(["abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm"]),
  900:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  901: 
  902:     try
  903:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  904:         check_content(Term,Text),
  905:         check_location(Term, {0, width(Text)}),
  906:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col+1]),
  907:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  908:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  909:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  910:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col]),
  911:         %% xnfix bug! at least in tmux... seems to work in iTerm as it does not
  912:         %% need xnfix when resizing
  913:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  914:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text) div 2 + Col]),
  915:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col + width(Text) div 2}),
  916:         ok
  917:     after
  918:         stop_tty(Term)
  919:     end.
  920: shell_small_window_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  921:     Term0 = start_tty(Config),
  922:     tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term0)," -x ",30, " -y ", 6]),
  923:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term0),
  924:     Term = Term0#tmux{orig_location = {Row, Col}},
  925:     Text = ("xbcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  926:         "abcdefghijkl\n"++
  927:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  928:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklx"),
  929:     try
  930:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  931:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  932:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  933:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  934:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  935:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  936:         send_tty(Term, "C-Down"),
  937:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  938:         send_tty(Term, "Left"),
  939:         check_location(Term, {-1, -4}),
  940:         send_tty(Term, "Right"),
  941:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  942:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4A"),
  943:         check_location(Term, {-5, 0}),
  944:         check_content(Term,"xbc"),
  945:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4B"),
  946:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  947:         check_content(Term,"klx"),
  948:         send_tty(Term, " sets:is_e\t"),
  949:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
  950:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
  951:         check_location(Term, {-3, 6}),
  952:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  953:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  954:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  955:         send_tty(Term, "sets:is_e\t"),
  956:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
  957:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
  958:         check_location(Term, {-4, 9}),
  959:         send_tty(Term, "M-Enter"),
  960:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  961:         ok
  962:     after
  963:         stop_tty(Term)
  964:     end.
  965: shell_huge_input(Config) ->
  966:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  967: 
  968:     ManyUnicode = lists:duplicate(100,hard_unicode()),
  969: 
  970:     try
  971:         send_tty(Term,ManyUnicode),
  972:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode_match(Config) ++ "$",
  973:                       #{ replace => {"\n",""} }),
  974:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  975:         ok
  976:     after
  977:         stop_tty(Term)
  978:     end.
  979: shell_receive_standard_out(Config) ->
  980:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  981:     try
  982:         send_tty(Term,"my_fun(5) -> ok; my_fun(N) -> receive after 100 -> io:format(\"~p\\n\", [N]), my_fun(N+1) end.\n"),
  983:         send_tty(Term, "spawn(shell_default, my_fun, [0]). ABC\n"),
  984:         timer:sleep(1000),
  985:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that we are at the same location relative to the start.
  986:         check_content(Term, "3\\s+4\\s+.+>\\sABC"),
  987:         ok
  988:     after
  989:         stop_tty(Term)
  990:     end.
  991: %% Test that the shell works when invalid utf-8 (aka latin1) is sent to it
  992: shell_invalid_unicode(Config) ->
  993:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  994: 
  995:     InvalidUnicode = <<$,$,$>>, %%  in latin1
  996: 
  997:     try
  998:         send_tty(Term,hard_unicode()),
  999:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode() ++ "$"),
 1000:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1001:         check_content(Term, "illegal character"),
 1002:         %% Send invalid utf-8
 1003:         send_stdin(Term,InvalidUnicode),
 1004:         %% Check that the utf-8 was echoed
 1005:         check_content(Term, "\\\\345\\\\344\\\\366$"),
 1006:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1007:         %% Check that the terminal entered "latin1" mode
 1008:         send_tty(Term,"."),
 1009:         check_content(Term, "\\Q\\360\\237\\230\\200\\355\\225\\234.\\E$"),
 1010:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1011:         %% Check that we can reset the encoding to unicode
 1012:         send_tty(Term,"io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."),
 1013:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1014:         check_content(Term, "\nok\n"),
 1015:         send_tty(Term,""),
 1016:         check_content(Term, "$"),
 1017:         ok
 1018:     after
 1019:         stop_tty(Term),
 1020:         ok
 1021:     end.
 1022: 
 1023: 
 1024: %% Test the we can handle ansi insert, navigation and delete
 1025: %%   We currently can not so skip this test
 1026: shell_support_ansi_input(Config) ->
 1027: 
 1028:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1029: 
 1030:     BoldText = "\e[;1m",
 1031:     ClearText = "\e[0m",
 1032: 
 1033:     try
 1034:         send_stdin(Term,["{",BoldText,"ab",ClearText,"}"]),
 1035:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1036:         try check_location(Term, {0, width("{1mabm}")}) of
 1037:             _ ->
 1038:                 throw({skip, "Do not support ansi input"})
 1039:         catch _:_ ->
 1040:                 ok
 1041:         end,
 1042:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{ab}")}),
 1043:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term,"-e") end,
 1044:                       ["{", BoldText, "ab", ClearText, "}"]),
 1045:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1046:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1047:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a")}),
 1048:         send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
 1049:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
 1050:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
 1051:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1052:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1053:         check_content(Term, ["{", BoldText, "a"]),
 1054:         ok
 1055:     after
 1056:         stop_tty(Term),
 1057:         ok
 1058:     end.
 1059: 
 1060: shell_expand_location_below(Config) ->
 1061: 
 1062:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1063: 
 1064:     {Rows, _} = get_location(Term),
 1065: 
 1066:     NumFunctions = lists:seq(0, Rows*2),
 1067:     FunctionName = "a_long_function_name",
 1068: 
 1069:     Module = lists:flatten(
 1070:                ["-module(long_module).\n",
 1071:                 "-export([",lists:join($,,[io_lib:format("~s~p/0",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]),"]).\n\n",
 1072:                 [io_lib:format("~s~p() -> ok.\n",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]]),
 1073: 
 1074:     DoScan = fun F([]) ->
 1075:                      [];
 1076:                  F(Str) ->
 1077:                      {done,{ok,T,_},C} = erl_scan:tokens([],Str,0),
 1078:                      [ T | F(C) ]
 1079:              end,
 1080:     Forms = [ begin {ok,Y} = erl_parse:parse_form(X),Y end || X <- DoScan(Module) ],
 1081:     {ok,_,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms, [debug_info]),
 1082: 
 1083:     try
 1084:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1085: 
 1086:         %% First check that basic completion works
 1087:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1088:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1089:         %% Cursor at correct place
 1090:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:")}),
 1091:         %% Nothing after the start( completion
 1092:         check_content(Term, "start\\($"),
 1093: 
 1094:         %% Check that completion is cleared when we type
 1095:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1096:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:s")}),
 1097:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1098: 
 1099:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a term
 1100:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1101:         send_tty(Term, "["),
 1102:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1103:         send_tty(Term, ", test_after]"),
 1104:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", test_after]"],
 1105:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1106:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("[escript:s")}),
 1107:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1108:         send_tty(Term, "C-K"),
 1109: 
 1110:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a long term
 1111:         send_tty(Term, ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"),
 1112:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"],
 1113:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1114:         check_location(Term, {-4, width("[escript:s")}),
 1115:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1116:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1117:         send_stdin(Term, ".\n"),
 1118: 
 1119:         %% Check that we behave as we should with very long completions
 1120:         rpc(Term, fun() ->
 1121:                           {module, long_module} = code:load_binary(long_module, "long_module.beam", Bin)
 1122:                   end),
 1123:         check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1124:         send_stdin(Term, "long_module:" ++ FunctionName),
 1125:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1126:         %% Check that correct text is printed below expansion
 1127:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("Press tab to see all ~p expansions",
 1128:                                           [length(NumFunctions)])),
 1129:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1130:         %% The expansion does not fit on screen, verify that
 1131:         %% expand above mode is used
 1132:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term, "-S -5") end,
 1133:                       "\nfunctions\n"),
 1134:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "$"),
 1135: 
 1136:         %% We resize the terminal to make everything fit and test that
 1137:         %% expand below mode is used
 1138:         tmux(["resize-window -t ", tty_name(Term), " -y ", integer_to_list(Rows+10)]),
 1139:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1140:         send_stdin(Term, "\t\t"),
 1141:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name99\\($"),
 1142:         ok
 1143:     after
 1144:         stop_tty(Term),
 1145:         ok
 1146:     end.
 1147: 
 1148: shell_expand_location_above(Config) ->
 1149: 
 1150:     Term = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_expand_location","above"]}|Config]),
 1151: 
 1152:     try
 1153:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1154:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1155:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1156:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:")}),
 1157:         check_content(Term, "start\\(\n"),
 1158:         check_content(Term, "escript:$"),
 1159:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1160:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1161:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:s")}),
 1162:         check_content(Term, "\nscript_name\\([ ]+start\\(\n"),
 1163:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1164:         ok
 1165:     after
 1166:         stop_tty(Term),
 1167:         ok
 1168:     end.

 1170: %% Test the we can handle invalid ansi escape chars.
 1171: %%   tmux cannot handle this... so we test this using to_erl
 1172: shell_invalid_ansi(_Config) ->
 1173: 
 1174:     InvalidAnsiPrompt =
 1175:         case proplists:get_value(encoding, io:getopts(user)) of
 1176:             unicode ->
 1177:                 ["\e]94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e]0m"];
 1178:             latin1 ->
 1179:                 ["\e]94minvalid_test\e]0m"]
 1180:         end,
 1181: 
 1182:     rtnode:run(
 1183:       [{eval, fun() -> application:set_env(
 1184:                          stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1185:                          fun() -> InvalidAnsiPrompt end)
 1186:               end },
 1187:        {putline,"a."},
 1188:        {expect, "a[.]"},
 1189:        {expect, ["\\Q",InvalidAnsiPrompt,"\\E"]}],
 1190:       "", "",
 1191:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1192:        "-connect_all","false",
 1193:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1194:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1195:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1196:        "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1197:       ]).

 1199: shell_get_password(_Config) ->
 1200:    
 1201:     rtnode:run(
 1202:       [{putline,"io:get_password()."},
 1203:        {putline,"secret\r"},
 1204:        {expect, "\r\n\r\n\"secret\""}]),
 1205: 
 1206:     %% io:get_password only works when run in "newshell"
 1207:     rtnode:run(
 1208:       [{putline,"io:get_password()."},
 1209:        {expect, "\\Q{error,enotsup}\\E"}],
 1210:      "","",["-oldshell"]).

 1220:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qmore (y/n)? (y)\\E"),
 1221:                 send_tty(Term, "n\n"),
 1222:                 check_content(Term,"ok"),
 1223:                 send_tty(Term, "C-P"),
 1224:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qh(file).\\E"),
 1225:                 ok
 1226:             after
 1227:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1228:                 ok
 1229:             end
 1230:     end.
 1231: test_valid_keymap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1232:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1233:     Term = setup_tty([{args, ["-config", DataDir ++ "valid_keymap.config"]} | Config]),
 1234:     Prompt = fun() -> ["\e[94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e[0m"] end,
 1235:     erpc:call(Term#tmux.node, application, set_env,
 1236:               [stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1237:                proplists:get_value(shell_prompt_func_test, Config, Prompt)]),
 1238:     try
 1239:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid key"),
 1240:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid function"),
 1241:         send_tty(Term, "asdf"),
 1242:         send_tty(Term, "C-u"),
 1243:         check_content(Term, ">$"),
 1244:         send_tty(Term, "1.\n"),
 1245:         send_tty(Term, "C-b"),
 1246:         check_content(Term, "2>\\s1.$"),
 1247:         ok
 1248:     after
 1249:         stop_tty(Term),
 1250:         ok
 1251:     end.

 1267: external_editor(Config) ->
 1268:     case os:find_executable("nano") of
 1269:         false -> {skip, "nano is not installed"};
 1270:         _ ->
 1271:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1272:             try
 1273:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1274:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1275:                 send_tty(Term, "\"some text with\nnewline in it\""),
 1276:                 check_content(Term,"3> \"some text with\\s*\n.+\\s*newline in it\""),
 1277:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"),
 1278:                 check_content(Term,"GNU nano [\\d.]+"),
 1279:                 check_content(Term,"\"some text with\\s*\n\\s*newline in it\""),
 1280:                 send_tty(Term, "Right"),
 1281:                 send_tty(Term, "still"),
 1282:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1283:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% save in nano
 1284:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1285:                 send_tty(Term, "C-X"), %% quit in nano
 1286:                 check_content(Term,"3> \"still\\s*\n\\s*.+\\s*some text with\\s*\n.+\\s*newline in it\""),
 1287:                 send_tty(Term,".\n"),
 1288:                 check_content(Term,"\\Q\"still\\nsome text with\\nnewline in it\"\\E"),
 1289:                 ok
 1290:             after
 1291:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1292:                 ok
 1293:             end
 1294:     end.
 1295: 
 1296: external_editor_visual(Config) ->
 1297:     case os:find_executable("vim") of
 1298:         false ->
 1299:             {skip, "vim is not installed"};
 1300:         _ ->
 1301:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1302:             try
 1303:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1304:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1305:                 check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1306:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"VISUAL\",\"vim -u DEFAULTS -U NONE -i NONE\").\n"),
 1307:                 check_content(Term, "4>"),
 1308:                 send_tty(Term,"\"hello"),
 1309:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% Open vim
 1310:                 check_content(Term, "^\"hello"),
 1311:                 send_tty(Term, "$"), %% Set cursor at end
 1312:                 send_tty(Term, "a"), %% Enter insert mode at end
 1313:                 check_content(Term, "-- INSERT --"),
 1314:                 send_tty(Term, "\"."),
 1315:                 send_tty(Term,"Escape"),
 1316:                 send_tty(Term,":wq"),
 1317:                 send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1318:                 check_content(Term, "\"hello\"[.]$"),
 1319:                 send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1320:                 check_content(Term, "\"hello\""),
 1321:                 check_content(Term, "5>$")
 1322:             after
 1323:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1324:                 ok
 1325:             end
 1326:     end.
